title: 1000th Win!
body: Hey, I'm not sure if Rioters still do this, but I am at 999 wins and was wondering if there was any Rioter that would be available Today Between 7 and 12 PM EST? It would be incredible if this would be possible. I don't know if this discussion is in the right board, but I did not think it belonged in any other so i put it here.

replies.body: We still do! I'm a little late, but I'll play if you still need someone! :3
Hey, I was just able to see this, Like I said, I only had between that time because I had Exams to take, but I am free starting today, and I'll be able to play as long as its not to late EST
